original_text:
But what can I say?
    He has spoken to me, and he himself has done this.
I will walk humbly all my years
    because of this anguish of my soul.
korean_text: 주께서 내게 말씀하시고 또 친히 이루셨사오니 내가 무슨 말씀을 하오리이까 내 영혼의 고통으로 말미암아 내가 종신토록 방황하리이다

sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 내가 무엇을 말할 수 있겠는가?

sentences.original_text: and he himself has done this.
I will walk humbly all my years
because of this anguish of my soul.
